long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This powerful Chrome extension leverages Google Gemini AI to instantly read and summarize the terms and conditions and / or privacy policy of any webpage. 

Say goodbye to the hassle of wading through endless legal jargon—T&C Reader delivers concise, easy-to-understand summaries so you can stay informed without wasting time.

Key Features:

1. Instant Summaries: Get a clear, concise summary of complex terms and conditions in seconds, powered by Google Gemini AI.

2. Privacy Insights: Understand how your data is being used with straightforward explanations of privacy policies.

3. Hidden Fees Alert: Detect and highlight any hidden fees or charges within the terms and conditions.

4. Time-Saving: No more endless scrolling—get the key points without the hassle.

5. User-Friendly Interface: Easy-to-use and integrated seamlessly into your browsing experience.

Why T&C Reader?
Your time and privacy are valuable. With T&C Reader, you can make informed decisions quickly, protect your personal data, and avoid hidden fees—all with the power of AI.

How It Works

1. Install the Extension: Add T&C Reader to your Chrome browser with a single click.

2. Browse as Usual: Navigate the web as you normally would.

3. Activate on Any Page: When you encounter a terms and conditions page, simply click the T&C Reader icon in your toolbar.

4. Read the Summary: Instantly receive a summarized version of the terms, highlighting key points and important clauses.

Get Started
Install T&C Reader today and take control of your online experience. Simplify the complex and stay informed—effortlessly.
